00017 XThreadLocal<std::deque<shared_ptr<XNode> > > XNode::stl_thisCreating;

00020 XNode::XNode(const char *name, bool runtime)
00021     : m_children(), m_name(name ? name : "")
00022 {
00023     // temporaly shared_ptr to be able to use shared_from_this() in constructors
00024     XNode::stl_thisCreating->push_back(shared_ptr<XNode>(this));
00025     ASSERT(shared_from_this());
00026     m_flags = (runtime ? FLAG_RUNTIME : 0) | FLAG_UI_ENABLED | FLAG_ENABLED;
00027     dbgPrint(QString("xnode %1 is created., addr=0x%2, size=0x%3")
00028              .arg(getName())
00029              .arg((unsigned int)this, 0, 16)
00030              .arg((unsigned int)sizeof(XNode), 0, 16));
00031 }
00032 XNode::~XNode() {
00033     dbgPrint(QString("xnode %1 is being deleted., addr=0x%2").arg(getName()).arg((unsigned int)this, 0, 16));
00034 }
00035 std::string
00036 XNode::getName() const {
00037     return m_name;
00038 }
00039 std::string
00040 XNode::getTypename() const {
00041     std::string name = typeid(*this).name();
00042     unsigned int i = name.find('X');
00043     ASSERT(i != std::string::npos);
00044     ASSERT(i + 1 < name.length());
00045     return name.substr(i + 1);
00046 }
00047 void
00048 XNode::insert(const shared_ptr<XNode> &ptr)
00049 {
00050     ASSERT(ptr);
00051     if(!ptr->m_parent.lock())
00052         ptr->m_parent = shared_from_this();
00053     for(;;) {
00054         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> old_list(m_children);
00055         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> new_list(old_list ? (new NodeList(*old_list)) : (new NodeList));        
00056         new_list->push_back(ptr);
00057         if(new_list.compareAndSwap(old_list, m_children)) break;
00058     }
00059 }
00060 void
00061 XNode::disable() {
00062     for(;;) {
00063         int flag = m_flags;
00064         if(atomicCompareAndSet(flag, flag & ~(FLAG_ENABLED | FLAG_UI_ENABLED), &m_flags))
00065             break;
00066     }
00067     onUIEnabled().talk(shared_from_this());
00068 }
00069 void
00070 XNode::setUIEnabled(bool v) {
00071     if(!isEnabled()) return;
00072     for(;;) {
00073         int flag = m_flags;
00074         if(atomicCompareAndSet(flag, v ? (flag | FLAG_UI_ENABLED) : (flag & ~FLAG_UI_ENABLED), &m_flags))
00075             break;
00076     }
00077     onUIEnabled().talk(shared_from_this());
00078 }
00079 void
00080 XNode::touch() {
00081     onTouch().talk(shared_from_this());
00082 }
00083 
00084 void
00085 XNode::clearChildren()
00086 {
00087     m_children.reset();
00088 }
00089 int
00090 XNode::releaseChild(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00091 {
00092 //  node->m_parent.reset();
00093     for(;;) {
00094         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> old_list(m_children);
00095         if(!old_list) return -1;
00096         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> new_list(new NodeList(*old_list));
00097         NodeList::iterator it = find(new_list->begin(), new_list->end(), node);
00098         if(it == new_list->end()) return -1;
00099         new_list->erase(it);
00100         if(new_list->empty())
00101             new_list.reset();
00102         if(new_list.compareAndSwap(old_list, m_children)) break;
00103     }
00104     return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 shared_ptr<XNode>
00108 XNode::getChild(const std::string &var) const
00109 {
00110     shared_ptr<XNode> node;
00111     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(children());
00112     if(list) { 
00113         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00114             if((*it)->getName() == var) {
00115                 node = *it;
00116                 break;
00117             }
00118         }
00119     }
00120     return node;
00121 }
00122 shared_ptr<XNode>
00123 XNode::getParent() const
00124 {
00125     return m_parent.lock();
00126 }

00136         (*m_validator)(sc);

00148 template <typename T, int base>
00149 void
00150 XValueNode<T, base>::value(const T &t) {
00151     if(m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.empty() && m_tlkOnValueChanged.empty()) {
00152         m_var = t;
00153     }
00154     else {
00155         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_valuemutex);
00156         shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> ptr = 
00157             dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this());
00158         m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00159         m_var = t;
00160         m_tlkOnValueChanged.talk(ptr); //, 1, &statusmutex);
00161     }
00162 }

00164 template <>
00165 void
00166 XValueNode<int, 10>::_str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00167     bool ok;
00168     int var = QString(str).toInt(&ok, 10);
00169     if(!ok)
00170         throw XKameError(KAME::i18n("Ill string conversion to integer."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00171     value(var);
00172 }
00173 template <>
00174 void
00175 XValueNode<unsigned int, 10>::_str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00176     bool ok;
00177     unsigned int var = QString(str).toUInt(&ok);
00178     if(!ok)
00179         throw XKameError(KAME::i18n("Ill string conversion to unsigned integer."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00180     value(var);
00181 }
00182 template <>
00183 void
00184 XValueNode<unsigned int, 16>::_str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00185     bool ok;
00186     unsigned int var = QString(str).toUInt(&ok, 16);
00187     if(!ok)
00188         throw XKameError(KAME::i18n("Ill string conversion to hex."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00189     value(var);
00190 }
00191 template <>
00192 void
00193 XValueNode<bool, 10>::_str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00194     bool ok;
00195     bool x = QString(str).toInt(&ok);
00196     if(ok) {
00197         value( x ? true : false );
00198         return;
00199     }
00200     if(QString(str).stripWhiteSpace().lower() == "true") {
00201         value(true); return;
00202     }
00203     if(QString(str).stripWhiteSpace().lower() == "false") {
00204         value(false); return;
00205     }
00206     throw XKameError(KAME::i18n("Ill string conversion to boolean."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00207 }

00209 template <typename T, int base>
00210 std::string
00211 XValueNode<T, base>::to_str() const {
00212     return QString::number(m_var, base);
00213 }
00214 template <>
00215 std::string
00216 XValueNode<bool, 10>::to_str() const {
00217     return m_var ? "true" : "false";
00218 }

00244 XStringNode::operator std::string() const {
00245     return to_str();

00247 void
00248 XStringNode::value(const std::string &t) {
00249     if(beforeValueChanged().empty() && onValueChanged().empty()) {
00250         m_var = t;
00251     }
00252     else {
00253         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_valuemutex);
00254         beforeValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00255         m_var = t;
00256         onValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00257     }
00258 }

00260 XDoubleNode::XDoubleNode(const char *name, bool runtime, const char *format)
00261     : XValueNodeBase(name, runtime), m_var(0.0)
00262 {
00263     if(format)
00264         setFormat(format);
00265     else
00266         setFormat("");
00267 }
00268 std::string
00269 XDoubleNode::to_str() const
00270 {
00271     return formatDouble(m_format.c_str(), m_var);
00272 }
00273 void
00274 XDoubleNode::_str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &)
00275 {
00276     bool ok;
00277     double var = QString(str).toDouble(&ok);
00278     if(!ok) 
00279         throw XKameError(KAME::i18n("Ill string conversion to double float."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00280     value(var);
00281 }
00282 void
00283 XDoubleNode::value(const double &t) {
00284     if(beforeValueChanged().empty() && onValueChanged().empty()) {
00285         m_var = t;
00286     }
00287     else {
00288         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_valuemutex);
00289         beforeValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00290         m_var = t;
00291         onValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00292     }
00293 }
00294 XDoubleNode::operator double() const
00295 {
00296     return m_var;

00299 const char *
00300 XDoubleNode::format() const {
00301     return m_format.c_str();
00302 }
00303 void
00304 XDoubleNode::setFormat(const char* format) {
00305     std::string fmt;
00306     if(format) fmt = format;
00307     try {
00308         formatDoubleValidator(fmt);
00309         m_format = fmt;
00310     }
00311     catch (XKameError &e) {
00312         e.print();
00313     }
00314 }
